title: [BUG] Avif is not present in SKEncodedImageFormat enum
body:
AVIF support was added to SkHeifCodec in Skia milestone 88

also in SkEncodedImageFormat enum - https://github.com/google/skia/blob/chrome/m88/include/core/SkEncodedImageFormat.h

comments.author: LukePulverenti
comments.body: @mgood7123 since you added that, has it worked well?

comments.author: mgood7123
comments.body:
> @mgood7123 since you added that, has it worked well?

have not got a chance to test it yet as i dont have any AVIF encoded images

https://github.com/mono/skia/pull/92

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/2154

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for the issue and the work to get all the PRs up. I have merged and it will appear in the preview feed shortly as well as in the next SkiaSharp release.
